The app works ok most of the time but honestly... Amazon delivery has gone seriously down hill. There's no where to add feedback with Amazon in general"," so here goes.....the delivery has changed for the worst"," Hermes"," Evri"," Royal mail all seem to be struggling. Deliveries are now commonly late"," notifications are all over the place and inaccurate. Are they overworked and underpaid? I suspect this is the case. Amazon prime shopping"," is no longer a reliable marketplace.

I ordered the Holy Stone GPS Drone with 4K UHD Camera and a type C adapter"," expecting them to arrive on time as indicated. Unfortunately"," the drone was delivered six hours late"," and the type C adapter was delayed by an entire day. As someone who works and lives in Mt. Rainier"," time is of the essence. I waited as long as I could"," but the items arrived too late for my needs. To make matters worse all anybody from amazon could say is pick up your item like they didn't just hear me say I can't

Ever since the last update is an EBT customer when I submit my order in the grocery part of the app for Amazon Fresh it does not allow me to put in my PIN number for my EBT card the first time. I have to wait for a message from Amazon in my email saying my order was canceled. After that I have to put place items in new cart and update payment method which was the same method as I was using before. This is time consuming and makes no sense. Watch ordering when you have multiple addresses in your membership. My Amazon membership is in MY name"," I had chosen MY billing address & I had ordered VERY recently from them for a delivery to ME. So why the app chose my sister's address to receive the most recent order"," I have no idea. It's a serious glitch. I have had to remove all of my sister's information"," but I am very leery about ordering from them again at this point"," especially since the cost is still pending.
